typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'excel',
	fileSystem: 'lakehiram',
	fileName: 'PA_MR_3D_Demo.xlsx',
	sheetName: 'PA3DModel',
	firstRowAsHeader: true) ~> XLSX
source(output(
		Name as string,
		{3DModel [image]} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> AppendedCSVs
XLSX, AppendedCSVs union(byName: true)~> Union1
Union1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delimited',
	fileSystem: 'lakehiram',
	folderPath: 'Sink',
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	escapeChar: '\\',
	qutoChar: '\"',
	columnNamesAsHeader: false,
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> sink1
